p: The number of glandular trichomes is not impacted by the mechanical impedance applied on plant roots for M. pulegium whereas the essential oil amount of pulegone increased 20 times [ 14]. Thus, the use of Olive mill wastewater as an organic amendment applied at 8 l/m 2, two months before plantation of M. spicata cuttings, allows an increase of 94% of the biomass yield and 17% of essential oil yield with significant changes in essential oil composition [ 27].
